channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- Asset Suite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- Asset Suite

item.title: CVE-2019-18998|2024-08-05T02:02:39.895Z -- abb -- asset%20suite
item.description: Insufficient access control in the web interface of ABB Asset Suite versions 9.0 to 9.3, 9.4 prior to 9.4.2.6, 9.5 prior to 9.5.3.2 and 9.6.0 enables full access to directly referenced objects. An attacker with knowledge of a resource's URL can access the resource directly.
